title: "Flying Carpets" by Steven Millhauser
description:
A man remembers a summer from his youth, filled with rides on a flying carpet. “Flying Carpets” is from Steven Millhauser’s collection THE KNIFE THROWER: AND OTHER STORIES, published by Crown in 1998.

This episode is sponsored by Calm (www.calm.com/LEVAR).
author: originals+lbr@stitcher.com (LeVar Burton and Stitcher)
